website_summaries.verdict: The Generation Zerogrand is a breathable and lightweight shoe, a great addition to Cole Haan’s comfortable sneakers. With its classic and simple silhouette, it can be a go-to shoe for any occasion.  By the looks of the model, anyone can tell that it is made with top-end materials, which is appreciated by many owners of the shoe.
pros: The majority of the purchasers appreciate the breathability and comfortability on feet of the Cole Haan Generation Zerogrand
The shoe features a minimalistic design, which matches any business-casual outfit, some wearers mention
Many testers are stun of the dark pink colorway of the shoe
A handful of reviewers mention the Generation Zerogrand from Cole Haan provides enough arch support
A handful of reviewers agree that the shoe consists of premium materials
The Generation Zerogrand is ideal for everyday use, according to many commenters
The upper’s material is comparable to Nike Flyknit Trainer, which is known to provide a snug fit, some reviewers mention
The is easy to slip on and off, several reviewers admit
cons: The shoe is a little bit firm and inflexible, a couple of reviewers who owns a pair complains

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I had worn out a pair of an earlier design ZeroGrand shoes I bought a few years ago. These are so much better fitting and give better support. I took off one star because the yellow finger flap at the heel sticks out into my pant cuff. Not a deal breaker. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: rpm

customer_reviews.title: Not what I exptected
customer_reviews.text: Pros: + Arrived on time and in pristine condition + Unique colors looks cool + No dented box, well packaged + Picture in seller's page is accurate + Hassle free return Cons: - The shoe size runs large, for me it was 1 or 1.5 large from the same shoe size I already have from Cole Haan - Wider than expected, makes any foot larger than they are
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect men’s shoe
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking men’s shoe. Husband gets tons of compliments each time her west’s them. Looks nice with dress pants and jeans. He says they are crazy comfortable as well
customer_reviews.author: Jami Dalton

customer_reviews.title: About half a size too big
customer_reviews.text: Did you own previous versions? If so buy half a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Babe ❤️‘s them!!!
customer_reviews.text: He loves Cole Haan and ❤️❤️❤️‘s these!!! Thank you for a quick exchange! They look great!!!
customer_reviews.author: LijaRock

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I own many Cole Haan and these are no different than any others I own. They are very comfortable, fits perfectly and look so super cool. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Senior Seegee

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly like in picture
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Runs a little big. My only issue was the back tag which is yellow in the picture was black in the pair that I received. Unfortunately I didn't notice until after I wore them so didn't bother returning. Other than that, comfortable and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Luengo

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: I bought these nice shoes for my brother and they run about 1 size large. I had to exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn and super breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Zander Day

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoe for work I am still in the break-in period but I like the way they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chaka D.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and comfortable. Ran a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable pair of shoes I own. Highly recommend. You can dress them up for the office or dress them down for the weekend- very versatile. I wear a size 12 in Nike sneakers. I purchased a 12 and they are about a 1/2 size too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mark VanderWende

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. My only complaint is that they aren't as comfortable as a nice running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan R.

customer_reviews.title: Walk all day in comfort
customer_reviews.text: I own four pair of Cole Haan and recently ordered my fiancé a pair, clearly I love how they fit and feel. Can walk all day in them no issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Easily the most comfortable CH I own out of 7. On my feet 12+ hours a day in a warehouse and my feet feel great afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One shoe was worn and dirty
customer_reviews.text: The shoe have been worn like the one that they put on the shelf to try on very disappointing as it wasn't cheap. Jus be careful as they might send you what ever they have.
customer_reviews.author: Koren hall

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits as expected. Very comfortable walking . I expect quality from Cole Haan and this shoe delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: to big
customer_reviews.text: Just tried them on and they are to big about 1/2 size. I want to exchange but it say I can now
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: WAY too big...
customer_reviews.text: I received a supposed 9-1/2 that was actually at least an 11. Couple this with the fact that the laces on this shoe are purely decorative and serve no functional purpose (really), and there was no way I could wear it. The shoe itself was not impressive enough to mess with trying to swap for the right size, so I just returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Odd sizing and design
customer_reviews.text: Cole Haan shoes are not true to size and they have an unusual shoe tongue and lacing design. Tried two different styles and both had the same issues. Nike and Reebok shoes always are a perfect fit. Will stick to Nike And Reebok henceforth. Also, beware this third party seller does not cover the cost of the return shipping. It gets deducted from the refund.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with Cole Haan
customer_reviews.text: Hey, they’re Cole Haans and they’re really comfortable. Glad I bought two pair.
customer_reviews.author: lsw

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: this is my 4th pair, (different styles) no downside to this shoe,,, maybe the most comfortable ever....
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS BERRY

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are augmented to your liking
customer_reviews.text: Cole haan Websites picture and Amazon pictures both very different they don’t look like how they should look compared to the online picture, not complaining tho they still look good just not what I expected sadly
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: The size very by the material
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, the quality and off corse the price was very affordable
customer_reviews.author: Julio cesar cruz mateo

product_meta.title: Cole Haan Men's Generation Zerogrand Stitchlite Trainers
product_meta.description: Proprietary Stitchlite upper for comfort and breathability Lined with fabric Fully padded sock for ultimate comfort Lightweight, pressed outsole provides cushioning and comfort. Flex grooves for extra flexibility
